summary: A Los Angeles Deputy District Attorney is sent to protect a woman who accidentally witnessed a Mafia murder.
cast: Gene Hackman|Anne Archer|James Sikking|J.T. Walsh|M. Emmet Walsh|Susan Hogan|Nigel Bennett|J.A. Preston|B.A. 'Smitty' Smith|Codie Lucas Wilbee|Barbara Russell|Antony Holland|Doreen Ramos|Kevin McNulty|Andrew Rhodes|Lon Katzman|Dana Still|Lesley Ewen|Barney O'Sullivan|Natino Bellantoni|Ted Stidder|Lindsay Bourne|Robert Rozen|Tom McBeath|Ron Cummins|Harris Yulin|Jennifer Fahrni|John Michael Quinn
title: Testigo accidental
